1.7 Warning and error conditions

<diagnostic>

Abstract class

Summary

The class that encapsulates diagnostic information returned by the DBMS.

Superclasses:

<condition>

Library

SQL

Module

SQL

Description

Encapsulates all diagnostic information returned by a DBMS, including diagnostic header and diagnostic records, as defined by SQL-92.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
